project_descr: Upscaling of climate smart agriculture in Swaziland. This will include piloting of conservation agriculture, water efficient irrigation technologies and high value marketing options.

outputs.output_descr: Pilot programme for Upscaling Conservation Agriculture, Water Efficient Irrigation Technologies and High Value Crops Marketing.
donor_name: Common Market for Eastern and Southern Africa (COMESA)
